articles.author: Kylie Maclellan
articles.title: UK air traffic issue fixed but flight disruption to continue - Reuters UK
articles.description: Britain's National Air Traffic Service (NATS) was hit by a technical problem for several hours on Monday, causing widespread disruption to flights using UK airspace that airlines and airports said would continue for some time despite the issue being fixed.
articles.content: LONDON, Aug 28 (Reuters) - Britain's National Air Traffic Service (NATS) was hit by a technical problem for several hours on Monday, causing widespread disruption to flights using UK airspace that ai… [+2577 chars]
